title: Useful Websites that Everyone Should Know
tags: most useful websites on the internet
Incredibly Useful Websites You Wish You Knew Earlier
Most useful Websites on the Internet that you must visit
description:
http://receivetipstricks.com/useful-websites
Meet some of the less known gems of the internet.

[Video content]


#1 Ninite Download all popular Windows software without having to click on NEXT NEXT each time on the setup wizard. It's quick, easy and you do not have to worry about installing a bloatware by mistake.

#2 SumoPaint Powerful online image editor that supports layers, blend mode and drop shadows etc. Best alternative to photoshop.

#3 Soundation Edit, mix or make your own music online.

#4 Studio stupeflix Join videos, images and audio files to make beautiful videos. You can either choose a from pre-built themes or start from the scratch

#5 Calm Practice guided meditations ranging from 2 to 20 minutes that will help you to reduce stress and boost your productivity.

#6 Grammarly Unlike the browser's spell check, Grammarly also looks
for grammatical error and punctuation mistakes. The free version is sufficient for most of the task.

#7 ScamAdviser Find out if the website is real or fake. Here you can find useful details like domain's age, owners contact info, website's traffic etc.  

#8 1happybirthday Give birthday wishes to your friends with a song that has their name in it. The great part is, all the songs are sung by artist and not using text-to-speech engine.

#9 r.sine.com Discover random interesting images or gif everytime you refresh the page. Some images might be NSFW.

#10 music.163.com This is a Chinese online music stream service and has great collections of Hindi and English songs.
